content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Hassan. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I know what your budget is for renting a 25 square meter apartment in Munich?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 600 Euros per month. I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. Thanks for your understanding.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Understood, Hassan. I appreciate your willingness to be a good tenant. Based on our discussion, I believe we can come to an agreement on a rental price that works for both of us. May I propose a rental price of 650 Euros per month? This represents a fair market value for a 25 square meter apartment in Munich, and it also allows me to maximize my gains as a landlord.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 650 Euros per month. Thank you for your understanding. I look forward to moving into the apartment.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: You're welcome, Hassan. I'm glad we could come to an agreement on the rental price. I appreciate your willingness to pay a fair market value for the apartment, and I look forward to having you as a tenant. If you have any questions or concerns in the future, please don't hesitate to contact me.
name: Heinrich Heine
